description:
Bring the party to the beach, BBQ or campground. This Coleman® cooler has a beefy 120-quart compartment to stash 102 cans and 27kg of ice. Insulation in the walls keeps ice chilly up to 3 days in summer temps – excellent for road trips or weekends when you’re a long way from the nearest store. Cup holders give you a safe spot to put your beverage, and the lid is sturdy enough to double as a chair to sit back and toast your prime campsite.

  • Thick TempLock™ FX insulation in lid and body holds in cold for days
  • Antimicrobial liner resists odours
  • Lid supports up to 113kg (250lb.)
  • Screw-on drain plug for easy cleaning
  • 4 cup holders prevent spills
  • Foldable side handles
  • Made with 15% less plastic than similar Coleman coolers
name: Coleman 120 QT Chest Cooler
